verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to her that is \w filthy|strong="H4754"\w* and \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w*, to the \w oppressing|strong="H3238"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*!\f + \fr 3.1 \ft her…: or, gluttonous: Heb. craw\f*

She \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; she \w received|strong="H3947"\w* not \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*; she \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* not in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; she drew not \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to her \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft correction: or, instruction\f*

Her \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* her \add are\add* \w roaring|strong="H7580"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*; her \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \add are\add* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w*; they gnaw not the \w bones|strong="H1633"\w* till the \w morrow|strong="H1242"\w*.

Her \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \add are\add* \w light|strong="H6348"\w* \add and\add* \w treacherous|strong="H0900"\w* \w persons|strong="H0582"\w*: her \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* have \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, they have done \w violence|strong="H2554"\w* to the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

The \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof; he will not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*: \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* doth he \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* his \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* to \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, he \w faileth|strong="H5737"\w* not; but the \w unjust|strong="H5767"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* no \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*.\f + \fr 3.5 \ft every…: Heb. morning by morning\f*

I have cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: their \w towers|strong="H6438"\w* are \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*; I made their \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*, that none passeth \w by|strong="H5674"\w*: their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* are \w destroyed|strong="H6658"\w*, so that there is no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, that there is none \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft towers: or, corners\f*

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely thou wilt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* me, thou wilt \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*; so their \w dwelling|strong="H4583"\w* should not be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, \w howsoever|strong="H0834"\w* I \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* them: \w but|strong="H0403"\w* they rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, \add and\add* \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* all their \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*.

¶ Therefore \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* ye upon me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to the \w prey|strong="H5706"\w*: for my \w determination|strong="H4941"\w* \add is\add* to \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, that I may \w assemble|strong="H6908"\w* the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, to \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* upon them mine \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*, \add even\add* all my \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*: for all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* with the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*.

For then will I \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* a \w pure|strong="H1305"\w* \w language|strong="H8193"\w*, that they may all \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w consent|strong="H7926"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft language: Heb. lip\f*\f + \fr 3.9 \ft consent: Heb. shoulder\f*

From \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w* my \w suppliants|strong="H6282"\w*, \add even\add* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w dispersed|strong="H6327"\w*, shall \w bring|strong="H2986"\w* mine \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* for all thy \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*, wherein thou hast \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me: for then I will take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee them that \w rejoice|strong="H5947"\w* in thy \w pride|strong="H1346"\w*, and thou shalt no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* be \w haughty|strong="H1361"\w* because of my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft because…: Heb. in my holy\f*

I will also \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee an \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* and \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they shall \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, nor \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*; neither shall a \w deceitful|strong="H8649"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: for they shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* and lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w*, and none shall make \add them\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*.

¶ \w Sing|strong="H7442"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; \w shout|strong="H7321"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w* with all the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, he hath cast \w out|strong="H6437"\w* thine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee: thou shalt not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* any more.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* it shall be \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou not: \add and to\add* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, Let not thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w slack|strong="H7503"\w*.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft slack: or, faint\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee \add is\add* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*; he will \w save|strong="H3467"\w*, he will \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* over thee with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*; he will \w rest|strong="H2790"\w* in his \w love|strong="H0160"\w*, he will \w joy|strong="H1523"\w* over thee with \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft rest: Heb. be silent\f*

I will \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \add them that are\add* \w sorrowful|strong="H3013"\w* for the solemn \w assembly|strong="H4150"\w*, \add who\add* are of thee, \add to whom\add* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of it \add was\add* a \w burden|strong="H4864"\w*.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft reproach…: Heb. the burden upon it was reproach\f*

Behold, at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* I will \w undo|strong="H6213"\w* all that \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* thee: and I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* her that \w halteth|strong="H6760"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* her that was driven \w out|strong="H5080"\w*; and I will \w get|strong="H7760"\w* them \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* and \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* in every \w land|strong="H0776"\w* where they have been put to \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft get…: Heb. set them for a praise\f*\f + \fr 3.19 \ft where…: Heb. of their shame\f*

At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you \add again\add*, even in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* that I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you: for I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* you a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* and a \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* among all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, when I turn \w back|strong="H7725"\w* your \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
